title: Life, Once Again! - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Acting   Angels   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Second Chance   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Special Abilities   Time Skip
author: Wise Dragon   어진용
description:
Sometimes, as we go about with our lives, we all happen to think of one specific thought at least once.

What if... I could go back to 'that' time?

The funny thing is, the moment you think such a thought is the precise moment when you came back to the past, from the future.

'One more time.'

Life, once again.>
